other_tests.findings: Revealed no underlying abscess, but dark red fluid was expressed from the lesion.
Showed neither white blood cells nor organisms.
Positive for B anthracis, with significant anthrax DNA present in serum sample and immunohistochemical detection of fragmented anthrax bacilli in biopsy tissue.

other_tests.procedure_name: Transfusion of packed red blood cells
other_tests.findings: Performed to address hematocrit decreased to 14.3%.

other_tests.procedure_name: Detection of IgM and IgG response (Western blot)
other_tests.findings: IgM response decreased, but IgG response intensified and extended to edema and lethal factors bands.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased IgG response indicates ongoing infection.
